title: Microsoft vs CRED offer evaluation
content:
Education: Tier-1 college, Non-Engineering
Years of Experience: 2 years

**Offer 1**

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 31.5 Lakhs INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4 L Relocation + 3 L Signing bonus (1.5L first year + 1.5L second year)
Stock bonus: 60000 USD vested 25% each year for 4 year ~ 12.5L per year
Bonus: 0% to 20% per year of Base salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): (31.5L + 3L@10% + 12.5L) ~ 47L per year

**Offer 2**

Company: Cred
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 45 Lakhs INR
ESOP bonus: 1 Crore vested over 4 years (Vesting Schedule 10/20/30/40)

Cannot negotiate further with Microsoft as I've already accepted the offer.

Which one would you guys take?
